name: Seges.GitHub.io
body:
# Welcome to Seges Open-Source corner

![seges logo](images/logo.png)

Here you find nice index of projects we are opening to the community.

## Docker

* [mug](http://seges.github.io/mug/) - Ultimate developer's tool to govern his local environment utilizing Docker
  * [mug-data](https://github.com/seges/mug-data) - Default developer data container for mug
* [cutlery](http://seges.github.io/cutlery) - Discovery, proxying and basid Docker environment for your development machine or production environment
* [openmq](https://github.com/seges/docker-openmq) - Docker image of OpenMQ message broker server

## Infrastructure

* [Tomcat Control Center](https://github.com/seges/tomcat-control-center) - Handy set of control scripts for Tomcat container(s) manageable from central place

## Chef

* [Grive](https://github.com/seges/chef-cookbook-grive) - Google Drive for Linux Cookbook
* [Mass Backup](https://github.com/seges/chef-cookbook-mass-backup) - A set of scripts to backup directories using Tartarus
* [OpenMQ](https://github.com/seges/chef-cookbook-openmq) - OpenMQ message broker server cookbook
* [Pencil](https://github.com/seges/chef-cookbook-pencil) - Pencil Wireframing tool Cookbook
* [Proxy Driver](https://github.com/seges/chef-cookbook-proxydriver) - Proxy driver for your Linux workstation Cookbook
* [Tomcat Control Center](https://github.com/seges/chef-cookbook-tcc) - Cookbook installing and setting up TCC
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
